en: In thee, O Jehovah, do I take refuge: Let me never be put to shame.
hmr: Aw LALPA nangmaa chun ka ringna kân nghat hlak a, Iengtika khawm muolphoin mîn umtir naw rawh.

en: Deliver me in thy righteousness, and rescue me: Bow down thine ear unto me, and save me.
hmr: I felna leiin mi sanhimin, mi sansuok la, Keia tieng hin i na hung sit la, mi sandam rawh.

en: Be thou to me a rock of habitation, whereunto I may continually resort: Thou hast given commandment to save me; For thou art my rock and my fortress.
hmr: Keia ta dingin umna lungpui, ka fe thei rawpna ding, hung ni la, Nangin kei mi sandam dingin thu i pêk a, Ka lungpui le ka kulpui i ni sih a.

en: Rescue me, O my God, out of the hand of the wicked, Out of the hand of the unrighteous and cruel man.
hmr: Aw ka Pathien, mi rilo kuta inthawkin mi sansuok la, Mi fel naw le nunsetak kuta inthawk chu.

en: For thou art my hope, O Lord Jehovah: Thou art my trust from my youth.
hmr: Aw LALPA Pathien, nang chu ka ibeisei chu i na, Ka naupangtea inthawka ka iring chu i nih.

en: By thee have I been holden up from the womb; Thou art he that took me out of my mother’s bowels: My praise shall be continually of thee.
hmr: Ka nu phîngsûnga inthawk hrimin nangma keihruoiin ka um hlak a, Ka nu phînga inthawka mi la suoktu i nih; Nang i nih kân pâk rawp ding che chu.

en: I am as a wonder unto many; But thou art my strong refuge.
hmr: Mi tamtak ngaiin thilmak ang ka na, Nisienlakhawm, nang chu kân humhimna dettak i nih.

en: My mouth shall be filled with thy praise, And with thy honor all the day.
hmr: Ka bau hi nangma inpâknain sip a ta, Sûnnithlâkin nangma chawimawinain sip bawk a tih.

en: Cast me not off in the time of old age; Forsake me not when my strength faileth.
hmr: Ka tar pha leh mi pei thla naw la, Ka tha a ṭhum pha leh mi mâksan bawk naw rawh.

en: For mine enemies speak concerning me; And they that watch for my soul take counsel together,
hmr: A mi dotuhai chun ka chung- châng thu an hril sih a, Ka hringna inchântuhai chu an inrâwn bawk a,

en: Saying, God hath forsaken him: Pursue and take him; for there is none to deliver.
hmr: “Pathienin a mâksan tah: Hnawt unla, man ro; sanhimtu ding hrim an um si nawh,” tiin.

en: O God, be not far from me; O my God, make haste to help me.
hmr: Aw Pathien, mîn hlat lul naw la, Aw ka Pathien, mi ṭhangpui dingin inhmaw rawh.

en: Let them be put to shame and consumed that are adversaries to my soul; Let them be covered with reproach and dishonor that seek my hurt.
hmr: Ka hringna dotuhai chu muolpho le bohmangin um sienla, Ka sietna ding zawngtuhai chu hrilsietna le inzakna inkhumin um raw se.

en: But I will hope continually, And will praise thee yet more and more.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, kei chun chu beisei rawp ka ta, Inpâk zuol deu deu ka ti che.

en: My mouth shall tell of thy righteousness, And of thy salvation all the day; For I know not the numbers thereof.
hmr: Ka bau hin i felna thu hril a ta, Sûnnithlâkin i sandamna thu hril bawk a ta, A tam chin ka hriet si nawh a.

en: I will come with the mighty acts of the Lord Jehovah: I will make mention of thy righteousness, even of thine only.
hmr: LALPA PATHIEN thilthaw ropuitakhai leh hung ka ta, I felna, nanga felna thu chau hril ka tih.

en: O God, thou hast taught me from my youth; And hitherto have I declared thy wondrous works.
hmr: Aw Pathien, ka naupangtea inthawk nangin i mîn chûktir a, Tu chen hin i thilmak thawhai chu kân hriettir hlak.

en: Yea, even when I am old and grayheaded, O God, forsake me not, Until I have declared thy strength unto the next generation, Thy might to every one that is to come.
hmr: Anih, aw Pathien, ka hung tar a, ka lu a hung inṭuok pha khawm mi mâksan lul naw la, I hrâtna hi ruolthar nâwkhai kuoma le I thilthawtheina hi la hung um dinghai taphawt kuoma kân hriettir hmakhat chu.

en: Thy righteousness also, O God, is very high; Thou who hast done great things, O God, who is like unto thee?
hmr: Aw Pathien, i felna khawm ân sâng êm êm a nih, Aw Pathien, nang thil ropuitakhai thawtu, Nangma ang hi tu am an um a?;

en: Thou, who hast showed us many and sore troubles, Wilt quicken us again, And wilt bring us up again from the depths of the earth.
hmr: Nang, lungzîngna tamtak le nasatak mîn hmutirtu chun, Mi sukhring nâwk i ta, hnuoi inthûktaka inthawkin mi ṭhuoisuok nâwk i tih.

en: Increase thou my greatness, And turn again and comfort me.
hmr: Nangin ka ropuina mi sukpungpêk la, Hung ngha nâwkin mi thlamuon rawh.

en: I will also praise thee with the psaltery, Even thy truth, O my God: Unto thee will I sing praises with the harp, O thou Holy One of Israel.
hmr: Perkhuongin inpâk bawk ka cheh a, Aw ka Pathien, i thutak ngei chu inpâk ka tih. Aw nang Israelhai Mi Inthieng, Ṭingṭang leh nangma inpâkin hla sak ka tih.

en: My lips shall shout for joy when I sing praises unto thee; And my soul, which thou hast redeemed.
hmr: Nangma inpâka hla ka sak pha chun ka hmûr hi hlim êm êm a ta, Ka hringna i întlan khawm hi hlim êm êm a tih.

en: My tongue also shall talk of thy righteousness all the day long; For they are put to shame, for they are confounded, that seek my hurt.
hmr: Ka lei khawm hin sûnnithlâk i felna thu hril a ta, Ka sietna ding zawngtuhai chu an muolphoin an inzak ta sih a.
